Sky Knight nodded to Blazer. "Bring them in from the side." he 
pointed. "Beserk will take anything as a threat." 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Blazer::
> 
> Blazer enter the room, two droids following him. "Allright, here 
they are, 
> calm down," he says to Sky Knight, looking over at Berserk, "Do you 
think he 
> could take on both of them?"
